name: "Limited Edition 2013 Hot Cocoa Gift Box"
description:
PRE-ORDER: 2013 Hot Cocoa Gift Box

Baby, it's cold outside! Warm your belly and your soul with our limited edition Hot Cocoa Gift Box set complete with 4 of our boozy marshmallows (three holiday flavors + one classic vanilla bean), a first-press edition Sugar Knife mug, and our own gourmet cocoa blend in a reusable Mason jar - all swagged out and dressed to impress in a white gift box tied with a red satin bow.

SPOILER ALERT: your giftee lives happily ever after.

Things you need to know: we only have 50 of these available and we expect to sell out quickly. This is a pre-order item: all boxes will ship December 17th - 19th via 2-day USPS Priority Mail (along with anything you order with it).

Includes a handwritten notecard with your message and can be shipped directly to your gift recipient (please include this info at checkout as necessary). Box includes:

(1) "Jingletown" 6-pack marshmallows

(1) "Happy Holidaze" 6-pack marshmallows

(1) "Gingerbread Rummy" 6-pack marshmallows

(1) "Hella Frangelica" 6-pack marshmallows

(1) 8 oz. premium hot cocoa mix in reusable Mason jar (Dutch-process cocoa, confectioner's sugar, powdered milk, Fleur de Sel, cinnamon, cayenne

(1) first press edition Sugar Knife mug

name: "THE PUFF DADDY"Gift Box
description:
(6) Dozen Marshmallows

'Cuz who only wants just one flavor?! This is the big Kahuna, the real deal, for those who believe that America was founded on the virtues of freedom, liberty, and the right to have as many boozy puffs as you damn well please. Stand tall, soldier - we salute you in your stellar choice of sugar!

Presented in our kraft gift box and tied with our signature black tulle ribbon. Yowza.

*Please note that the marshmallows in this box are rotational and may be substituted for other flavors! The current box includes:

"Hella Frangelica" (Vanilla Bean & Frangelico)

"You Fancy, Huh?" (Strawberries & Domain Chandon Champagne)

"Lemonage a Trois" (Lemon Juice, Lemon Zest, Limoncello)

"American Pie" (ACE Hard Apple Cider, Granny Smith Apples, Apple Pie Spices)

"Cookies and C.R.E.A.M." (Bailey's Irish Cream, Chocolate Cookies)

"Black Irish"(Guinness Stout, Dark Chocolate, Pretzels)

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

Gift-boxed and tied with our signature black tulle ribbon. Includes handwritten notecard with your message and can be shipped directly to your gift recipient. Please include this info at checkout as necessary.

(6) dozen approximately 1.25" x 1.25" x 1" handcut squares.

name: "THE BRITTLE BANGER" Gift Box
description:
(6) bags of 2 oz. Brittle

Beer. Whiskey. Sugar.
Finally, a gift box with the 3 major food groups. For the ultimate in crunchy, nutty, boozy goodness - snag one of these and grasp the true meaning of nirvana (hint: it doesn't smell like teen spirit). We can't prove it, but we're pretty sure that these are being bought as gifts only to be eaten by the purchaser alone in a dark closet. We won't snitch.

Presented in our signature black gloss gift box and tied with red tulle ribbon. Bam.

Flavors include:
Town Biz (Knob Creek & Pistachios)

Bourbonberry (Makers Mark, Cranberries, Almonds)

Blonde at the Bar (Blue Moon Beer, Orange Zest, Almonds)

The Filthy Pig (Bulleit, Bacon, Pecans)

Stout Daddy (Guinness Stout & Peanuts)

The Big Poppa (Rogue Double Chocolate Stout, Macadamias, Tart Dried Cherries, Chocolate Chips)

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

Gift-boxed and wrapped in our signature red tulle ribbon. Includes handwritten notecard with your message; can be shipped directly to your lucky gift recipient (make sure to include this info at checkout).

name: "Happy Holidaze"
description:
BAILEY'S IRISH CREAM™, BOURBON VANILLA BEAN, PEPPERMINT SWIRLS

The puff that started a revolution! It was a batch of these bad boys that sparked the creation of Sugar Knife and changed the marshmallow world forever. Booze. IN A PUFF. And if you're one of many who've been impatiently waiting all year, your day has finally come: "Happy Holidaze" is here in all its creamy, minty, luscious glory! A perfect blend of Bourbon Vanilla, Peppermint Swirls, and Bailey's Irish Cream - the ultimate accoutrement to every cup of cocoa you're having this winter.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, Bailey's Irish Cream™, Bourbon Vanilla Bean, peppermint extract, filtered water, Fleur de sel, red food coloring,confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "Gingerbread Rummy"
description:
PEETS™ DARK ROAST COFFEE, GINGERBREAD SPICES, FLOR DE CANA™ RUM

Hello, Gingerbread! There's really nothing more special than a gingerbread latte spiked with premium Nicaraguan rum, truth? Indulge in our newest, hottest, holiday flavor replete with a harmony of rich ginger, clove, and cinnamon spices and the deep roast flavor of Berkeley's favorite coffee house - finished with a splash of our favorite top shelf rum. Absolutely excellent floating atop your hot cocoa or torched on top of vanilla bean ice cream, but you'll find us most often stuffing our faces straight outta the bag.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, Peet's™ Dark Roast Coffee, Flor de Cana™ Rum, ginger, cloves, cinnamon, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "Jingletown"
description:
DARK CHOCOLATE, GRAND MARNIER™, ORANGE ZEST, CAYENNE PEPPER

Pimp out your winter mug o' cocoa with this delicate, yet dramatic blend of Guittard™ dark chocolate, freshly grated orange zest and Grand Marnier, finished with a pinch of cayenne pepper for a smooth kick of heat at the end. It's a perfect harmony of bold and warming flavors for those roaring-by-the-fireplace chilly nights.

Did you know? This puff was named after one of our favorite local hoods, which got its name in the late 1800s during Oakland's industrial boom: previously impoverished Portuguese immigrants would walk the streets proudly jingling their workday coins in their pockets, announcing their payday status for all to hear. While a jingling of our puffs would produce a lackluster cacophony in comparison, we're pretty sure you'd still attract quite the flock of honeys anyway.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, Guittard™ dark chocolate, Grand Marnier orange & cognac liqueur™, filtered water, orange zest, Fleur de sel, cayenne pepper, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "Hella Frangelica"
description:
VANILLA BEAN & FRANGELICO™

AS FEATURED ON FAST COMPANY's HOLIDAY PARTY GUIDE!

Here in sunny Northern California, we do things a little differently - and nobody does it like The Town. True Oakland love means real Bourbon Vanilla Bean swirled with the rich hazelnut taste of Frangelico™ for a hyphy twist on the traditional vanilla puff. Makes any cup o’ cocoa, uh - hella good.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, Frangelico™, filtered water, Bourbon vanilla bean paste, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "American Pie"
description:
GRANNY SMITH APPLES, ACE™ HARD APPLE CIDER, CINNAMON, GINGER

Wave that flag and shake that tail feather, this puff is as American as Apple Pie, baby! Our spiked apple pie marshmallow is made with loads of real Granny Smith apples, our own family-recipe spice blend, and a generous splash of ACE Hard Apple Cider. Peeps are blown away by how much this taste like a slice of everyone's favorite pie. Scoop o' vanilla ice cream not included! We just can't think of a MILF we want to eat more (that's "Marshmallow I'd Like To Fluff", gutter brain).

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, ACE Hard Apple Cider™, filtered water, Granny Smith apples, Fleur de sel, cinnamon, brown sugar, ginger, allspice, nutmeg, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "Lemonage à Trois"
description:
LEMON JUICE, LEMON ZEST, VENTURA™ LIMONCELLO

A naughty threesome of freshly-squeezed lemon juice, lemon zest, and a generous splash of natural Ventura Limoncello™ straight from the groves of sunny Southern California. These sinfully tart puffs are so good straight outta the bag, and extra proper melted in a classic s'more for a tangy lemon zing.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, lemon juice, Ventura Limoncello™, filtered water, lemon zest, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch, natural yellow coloring.

name: "Back That Razz Up"
description:
RASPBERRIES & CHAMBORD™

Girl you look good, won't you back that razz up?

A raspberry lover’s wet dream: a decadent blend of tart, ripe raspberries and Chambord™ Black Raspberry liqueur come together for an ecstatic orgy of berry bliss. Back one up into your mouth for a tantalizing out-of-body experience. Extra ridiculous dipped in creamy dark chocolate.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, raspberries, Chambord™ Black Raspberry liqueur, filtered water, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch

name: "Cookies & C.R.E.A.M."
description:
BAILEY'S IRISH CREAM™, BOURBON VANILLA BEAN, CHOCOLATE COOKIES

The people have spoken: this is our top-selling flavor!

Does cash rule everything around you? Plunk down some of that (cookie) dough and get in on what's undoubtably one of the greatest flavors ever concocted in the Sugar Knife mad lab (we're thinking Hall of Fame, yo). We're talking a supremely whippy vanilla bean marshmallow made with Bailey's Irish Cream and loaded with mad chunks of chocolate cookies, for the ultimate in classic American sugar highs. Guaranteed to take you down 36 chambers and back.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), Bailey's Irish Cream™, gelatin, vanilla bean paste, chocolate cookies, vanilla bean cream, filtered water, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "The Two Night Stand"
description:
DARK CHOCOLATE, CREME DE CACAO, CREME DE MENTHE

We remixed the classic "mint chocolate chip" into a boozy two-layered marshmallow - chocolate and mint together in one heavenly square. Topped liberally with dark chocolate shavings and even looks good the morning after. Cancel all your next-day appointments, 'cuz one night with this sassy puff just ain't enough.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, creme de cacao, creme de menthe, filtered water, Fleur de sel, Guittard dark chocolate, peppermint extract, confectioner's sugar, potato starch, natural green coloring.

name: "The Black Irish"
description:
GUINNESS™ STOUT, CHOCOLATE, CHOCOLATE-COVERED PRETZELS

Orgasmic. The one word to describe this godly confection - a deep chocolate marshmallow made with the rich, robust flavor of Guinness™ and topped with a sprinkling of crushed chocolate-covered pretzels. Chocolate, Beer, & Pretzels - we're pretty sure that's a Holy Trinity somewhere!

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), Guinness™ Stout, gelatin, Guittard™ premium cocoa powder, filtered water, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "You Fancy, Huh?"
description:
STRAWBERRIES & DOMAIN CHANDON™ CHAMPAGNE

Bursting with ripe berry flavor, the luxurious dalliance of juicy strawberries and Domain Chandon™ Champagne come together for the ultimate in truly sensuous pleasure. Pop open a bag of this bubbly and toast to the good life, ‘cuz you’re just so fancy like that (hair and nails did optional, but let's keep it tight, ladies).

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), strawberries, gelatin Domain Chandon™ Sparkling Wine, filtered water, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "The Smashing Pumpkin"
description:
ORGANIC PUMPKIN, ANDERSON VALLEY™ PUMPKIN ALE, CINNAMON, NUTMEG, GINGER, CLOVES

It's Fall, our favorite time of the year, so you know we had to welcome the season of harvest with a Sugar Knife pumpkin puff. Besides the fact that a pumpkin flavor is pretty much obligatory right now, we actually have a thing for the bright orange gourd. So we crafted our Smashing Pumpkin to taste just like the pie grandma sets on the table ever autumn, using the same recipe of spices our very own bestemor used to. Spiked with local Boonville brewery Anderson Valley's seasonal pumpkin Ale, of course, 'cuz we like our pie a little tipsy. We know, Today is the greatest day you've ever known and Try, Try, Try as you might you can't help but want to devour these Sweet, Sweet puffs by Starlight! Those are songs.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 15th! Ships 5-7 days after order is placed.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares).

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, organic pumpkin, Anderson Valley™ Hard Pumpkin Ale, filtered water, Fleur de sel, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "Ghost Ride the Whip"
description:
CANDIED PISTACHIOS & DISARONNO AMARETTO™

You've never seen a sideshow like this. The velvety smooth taste of Disaronno Amaretto™ with bits of sweet, candied pistachios. So uniquely delicious, just one bite will have you hooked and completely uncertain about your path in life. Drop a few puffs in your morning coffee and buckle up for this wild ride of explosive flavor! Blaring beats and tire marks not included.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares). Ships 6-7 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), gelatin, candied pistachios, Disaronno Amaretto™, Fleur de sel, confectioner’s sugar, potato starch, Fleur de Sel.

name: "NOLA Baby"
description:
CAFE DU MONDE COFFEE™, CANDIED PECANS, PRALINE LIQUEUR

Mardi Gras parades, big band jazz, voodoo magic – what’s not to love about America’s most enchanting city? Bite into The Big Easy with the deep chicory flavor of Cafe Du Monde Coffee™, French Quarter Praline Liqueur™, and bits of candied pecans (“show your bits!”). A divine coffee flavored puff that’ll make you break out in a second line.

(1 or 1/2 dozen approximately 1.25 x 1.25 x 1 handcut squares). Ships 6-7 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), Cafe Du Monde coffee™, candied pecans, gelatin, filtered water, French Quarter Praline liqueur™, Fleur de sel, confectioner's sugar, potato starch.

name: "The Filthy Pig"
description:
BULLEIT BOURBON™, Niman Ranch BACON, PECANS

So, this little piggie walks into a bar...

What do you get when you combine the smoky flavor of Niman Ranch bacon with the sweet crunch of pecans, and the bold and spicy warmth of America's finest bourbon? You get bacon brittle crack. That's what you get. Bacon brittle crack that's so addicting, you'll have to go to confession just to cleanse yourself of all the filthy, sybaritic lust you just can't shake off. It'll have you going wee, wee, wee, all the way home.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Bulleit Bourbon™, toasted pecans, candied bacon (Niman Ranch nitrate-free), sugar syrup (cane sugar, filtered water, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "Bourbonberry"
description:
MAKERS MARK™, DRIED CRANBERRIES, ALMONDS

Maybe you won't find a bourbonberry at your supermarket fruit aisle (clearly you're shopping wrong), but you'll sure find 'em stacked high over 'round this way. Crunchy. Nutty. Kentucky Straight Bourbon heaven with the tart tang of dried cranberries. A whiskey brittle that'll make you believe again, in whatever it is you stopped believing in. Hallelujah!

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 15th! Ships 5-7 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Makers Mark Bourbon Whiskey™, toasted almonds, dried cranberries, sugar syrup (cane sugar, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "Town Biz"
description:
KNOB CREEK™ & PISTACHIOS

Did you know? "The Town" is Oakland's unofficial nickname and one that some Seattleites continue to contest as their own, despite losing the moniker in a best-of-three roshambo match.

You know how we get down in The Town? We drink ourselves silly while cracking pistachios with our teeth. Right, we don't really do that, but we do sit around prattling about how prohibition must have really sucked a big one, and then we count our small batch barrel-blended whiskey blessings by stuffing our faces full of Town Biz pistachio brittle while comparing our jog times around Lake Merritt and laughing about how shitty the weather and parking in San Francisco is. Heh. That's just Oakland #townbizness, of course. Don't know about the rest of y'all.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey™, roasted pistachios, sugar syrup (cane sugar, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract, baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "The Big Poppa"
description:
ROGUE DOUBLE CHOCOLATE STOUT™, CHERRIES, MACADAMIA NUTS, CHOCOLATE CHIPS

AS FEATURED ON BON APPETIT'S HOLIDAY GIFT GUIDE!

Bam. Only the most ridiculously decadent, packed-to-the-sky beer brittle deserves the ultimate title of The Big Poppa. A two-hand fist pump, please, for our Rogue Double Chocolate Stout™ beer brittle made with tart dried Montmorency cherries and Hawaii-grown macadamia nuts, studded with Guittard™ mini dark chocolate chips. Chocolatey crunchy goodness so heavenly, it'll have you Ready To Die.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Rogue Double Chocolate Stout™, dried Montmorency cherries, macadamia nuts, Guittard™ mini chocolate chips, sugar syrup (cane sugar, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract, baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "Blonde at the Bar"
description:
BLUE MOON BEER™, ALMONDS, ORANGE ZEST

Flirty and just a bit of a tease, this bombshell just kills it with Blue Moon's™ signature crisp finish (with hints of orange peel and coriander) and the citrusy bite of freshly-grated orange zest. We love this hot little number crumbled on top of whipped frosting! Walk on up to the bar and spit your best game - this is one blonde at the bar who'll actually go home with you tonight.

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Blue Moon™ blonde ale, orange juice, toasted almonds, orange zest, sugar syrup (cane sugar, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract, baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "Stout Daddy"
description:
PEANUTS & GUINNESS STOUT™

Oh, yes we did. Threw together two classic bar buddies to create the most addictive, perfectly crunchy, can't-stop-eating-this-so-I-won't-even-try brittle. The rich, roasted barley flavor of the world's most beloved stout and the slightly salty crunch of everyone's favorite nut. Sweet, salty, and perfect. Who's your stout daddy?

HOLIDAY ORDER DEADLINE is December 10th! Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, butter, Guinness Stout™, roasted Virginia peanuts, sugar syrup (cane sugar, cream of tartar, sea salt), organic vanilla extract, baking soda, Fleur de sel.

name: "Blood and Sand"
description:
JAMESON™ WHISKEY, BLOOD ORANGE BITTERS, TART DRIED CHERRIES

It's Jameson™. In a LOLLIPOP. We've licked 'em all, folks, and nothing's quite as special as whiskey in a sucker. A round of applause for the "Blood and Sand," debuting as the first of many artisan lollipops to the Sugar Knife candy line!

Inspired by Jenna's favorite cocktail from the Roaring 20's, this gourmet sucker is made with the warm spice of Jameson™ Whiskey and a dash of blood orange bitters, with bits of tart dried cherries and blood orange zest - reminiscent of those beautiful stained glass church windows you see everywhere backpacking around Europe. A pop that's as beautiful as it is sweet? We think that's pretty rad, too.

Pack of (6), (12), or (24) 1.5" diameter pops. Ships 7-10 days after order is placed.

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, Jameson™ Whiskey, light corn syrup, Sugar Knife housemade blood orange bitters, filtered water, orange zest, natural cherry oil, tart dried cherries, Fleur de sel.

name: "Blue Sky" Rock Candy
description:
Commemorate the biggest, baddest show there ever was with our limited edition Blue Sky rock candy: a blue apple flavor spiked with Hangar One Vodka for a kick like a mule - 'cuz we don’t believe in treading lightly. A MUST HAVE for any god-fearing Breaking Bad fan!

INGREDIENTS: Pure cane sugar, light corn syrup, filtered water, flavored candy oil, Hangar One vodka.
